name: Discovering Waypoints III
requirement:
Discover 5 waypoints in Sparkfly Fen, Mount Maelstrom, Iron Marches, Fireheart Rise, or Timberline Falls.

<c=@reminder>Waypoints allow you to travel quickly around the world. They are unlocked by visiting them once. You can teleport to any unlocked waypoint for a small amount of coin.</c>
